srm_search_adapter

Select the correct bus adapter instance from the hierarchy.

Walk from the leaf to the root looking for correct adapter inst.  Derived class must override the virtual function is_correct_adapter to select the correct instance.

Summary
srm_search_adapter
Select the correct bus adapter instance from the hierarchy.
Class Hierarchy
uvm_object
srm_search_adapter
Class Declaration
class srm_search_adapter extends uvm_object
Initialization
newCreate a new instance of search adapter .
get_adapterSelect the correct adapter and return it.
is_correct_adapterReturn true for the correct adapter.

Initialization

new

function new( string  name  =  "" )

Create a new instance of search adapter .

Use UVM factory to create the instance.

get_adapter

virtual function srm_bus_adapter get_adapter( srm_component  obj )

Select the correct adapter and return it.

Return null if no correct adapter found.

is_correct_adapter

virtual function bit is_correct_adapter( srm_bus_adapter  adapter )

Return true for the correct adapter.

Virtual function that must be implemented by the subclass.  Returns false by default.
